Articles.Content: hey everybody, ive been here a while, mostly lurking. I found KSP after running through the Off-topic section on Orbiter-Forum. Some of you look familiar, and i do see some fellow bronies :D im thinking about making a KSP tutorial for those who need it. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
thanks, anyone have any idea where my tutorials should start?
The Basics, like ship construction and what each part does.
